aboutText: Imagine a place where rules are different. Where rage is energy, and breaking is liberation.
aboutDescription: Smash Studio is a place where you can break things and relieve stress. It's a fun experience that allows you to relax and enjoy. Come alone or with friends and experience something different!
step1Desc: Before you start, you get protective gear to ensure your safety during the experience.
step2Desc: You can safely store all personal belongings in a locked locker.
step3Desc: Enter a specially prepared room where you can freely smash objects.
step4Desc: Feel relief and enjoy the unique experience of stress relief!
giftCardTitle: Gift Card for Rage Room – A Memorable Experience!
giftCardText: Looking for an original gift that provides an unforgettable experience and relieves stress? Our gift cards are the perfect way to let someone experience a unique smashing adventure!

package1.title: Smash Mujo
package1.description: Feel the relief as you smash a small electronic device, 10 small glass bottles, and 2 random household items! Enjoy 25 minutes of uninterrupted destruction with protective gear included for one person.

package2.title: Double Breakdown
package2.description: Experience an adrenaline rush while smashing a medium electronic device, 16 small glass bottles, and 2 large glass bottles, and 5 random household items! Enjoy a full 30 minutes of chaos, with protective gear for two people.

package3.title: Group Therapy
package3.description: Perfect for a team! Break a car windshield, smash 22 glass bottles, and 5 large glass bottles. Release all your stress in 40 minutes of total destruction with protective gear for four people.

package4.title: Total Chaos
package4.description: The ultimate challenge for real chaos lovers! Destroy a large electronic device, 8 glass bottles, 28 small glass bottles, and 10 random household items. You have 45 minutes for total destruction, with protective gear for four people.

giftCard.title: Gift Card for Rage Room – An Experience to Remember!
giftCard.description: Looking for an original gift that provides an unforgettable experience and relieves stress? Our gift cards are the perfect way to give someone a smashing adventure!

list.item1: ✅ Perfect gift for any occasion – birthdays, anniversaries, celebrations, or as a thoughtful gesture
list.item2: ✅ Easy purchase – visit us, choose your package, and get a gift card to surprise someone with a special experience
list.item3: ✅ Flexible usage – the gift card recipient can choose the date and time that suits them best

giftCard.highlight: Give the gift of an adrenaline-filled experience they'll talk about for years!
